parameters.name: Credential
parameters.description: The name of the secret that contains the Transport Layer Security (TLS) certificate and certificate authority (CA) certificate.

parameters.name: ForceHttps
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to forcibly use TLS to protect connection security.

*   `true`: forcibly uses TLS to protect connection security.
*   `false`: does not forcibly use TLS to protect connection security.

parameters.name: Hosts
parameters.description: The one or more domain names that are exposed by the ASM gateway. Separate multiple domain names with commas (,).

parameters.name: IstioGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the ASM gateway.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of ASM gateways to query.

parameters.name: Number
parameters.description: The port that is provided by the ASM gateway.

parameters.name: Protocol
parameters.description: The type of the protocol. Valid values: `HTTP`, `HTTPS`, `GRPC`, `HTTP2`, `MONGO`, `TCP`, and `TLS`.
